title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Oslo, Norway
content:
Photo submitted by Ole Blokhus, “October 2nd, north of Oslo, Norway, an hour after heavy rains. Everywhere was a stream of water. Luckily, the trails are robust and handle water well. Coil suspension front and rear make the initial suspension movement so supple that grip is not a problem, even with fast rolling tires.” We

author: Kristi Benedict
